text: ‘Tōmālōkē bismita haichā nēki yē, tōmālōkara ōcarata tōmālōkaraē'i ējanara mādhyamata tōmālōkara pratipālakara taraphara paraā tōmālōkaka satarka karaāra bābē upadēśa āhichē? Ārau smaraṇa karaā yē, āllāhē tōmālōkaka nūhara sampradāẏara (dhbansara) pichata (tōmālōkara āgara lōkasakalara) sthalābhiṣikta karaichē ārau sr̥ṣṭita (daihika gaṭhanata) tōmālōkaka bēchi paraimāṇē hr̥ṣṭapuṣṭa- baliṣṭha karaichē. Gatikē tōmālōkē āllāhara anugrahasamūha smaraṇa karaā, yātē tōmālōkē saphala ha’ba pāraā’
